title: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here!
map_address: 1050 Wellness Place, Henderson NV 89011 near Gibson Rd.
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 642 Sq.
Welcome to The Well, a brand new apartment community in Henderson, Nevada, tailored to fit your ideal lifestyle.
LIVE WELL with thoughtful details such as quartz counters and large windows to let in the warm Nevada sunlight.
Enjoy the convenience of smart home features, such as activity notifications and lighting automation.
WELL by the pool, at the fitness center or in the lounge.
BE WELL in the heart of Union Village, the world's first integrated health village.
Anchored by Henderson Hospital, plans for Union Village include premium outdoor shopping, dining and entertainment venues, hotels, fitness clubs and more.
Call to schedule a tour today!

Spacious Studio, One-, Two- & Three-Bedroom Floor Plans, Walk-In Closets, Washers & Dryers, CASPAR Smart Home Technology, GE Stainless Steel Appliances, Glass Tile Kitchen Backsplashes, Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting, Choice of Two Stylish Interior Packages, WiFi Ready with Modem &
Free, Provided by Cox, Quartz Countertops, Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Private Patios & Balconies*
**Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time.

Chic Clubhouse with a Fireplace & Big-Screen TVs, Coffee Bar with TopBrewer App-Powered Espresso Machine, Conference Room, Outdoor Lounge with BBQ Grills, Game Room with Billiards, 24-Hour Fitness Center, Question Mark-Shaped Pool with Spa Deck, 24/7 On-Demand Parcel Lockers, Sport Court & Playground, Entertainment Kitchen with a Community Dining Space
